arts.ttl: George Eastham obituary: One of England's boys of 1966 who ended football 'slavery' - today's players owe a debt of gratitude to former Arsenal, Newcastle and Stoke star
arts.sum: Eastham will forever be associated with magic but it says everything about his remarkable career that winning the World Cup and League Cup are not his most important achievements.

arts.ttl: Sheff Wed battle past Stoke despite early red
arts.sum: Josh Windass and Callum Paterson fired 10-man Sheffield Wednesday to a hard-fought 2-0 Sky Bet Championship victory over Stoke at Hillsborough.

arts.ttl: Josh Windass and Callum Paterson fire 10-man Sheffield Wednesday past Stoke
arts.sum: Owls defender Di’Shon Bernard was dismissed in the first half.

arts.ttl: Stoke City team news vs Sheffield Wednesday as Narcis Pelach's hand is forced
arts.sum: Ben Pearson, if he comes back, is another player who can win more duels and second balls in the middle of the park because he has played a lot in the Championship and he knows what it is. "I expect Bosun Lawal, when he comes back and is fit, to give us that physicality in midfield.

arts.ttl: Bailey Cadamarteri's dream? 'To beat my dad's legacy'
arts.sum: For fans of a certain vintage, the name Cadamarteri will ring a bell or two.

arts.ttl: Sheff Wed vs Stoke live news, action and updates from early kick-off
arts.sum: Rohl is a popular figure around here for the work he has done since taking charge in October last year and is hoping to keep looking up the table and towards the play-off spots in the New Year. We will have all the news, action and reaction as it happens from Hillsborough.

arts.ttl: George Eastham's Stoke City Wembley glory was overshadowed by far bigger battle
arts.sum: A second generation England international, following in the footsteps of his once-capped father George Senior, Eastham was the only Gunners player in Sir Alf Ramsey’s World Cup-winning squad. With relations between club and player at rock bottom due to Eastham’s desire to find other work to supplement his football earnings being rebuffed by Newcastle, he requested a move south – to join Arsenal – but it was rejected by the Magpies.

arts.ttl: Tributes pour in for 'elegant' George Eastham as Stoke City confirm gesture
arts.sum: Stoke City have confirmed that they'll be wearing black armbands in this lunch-time's meeting with Sheffield Wednesday following the death of club legend George Eastham, which was confirmed on Friday evening. The Potters head to Hillsborough this morning for a 12:30pm kick off and the players, as confirmed by the club, will don armbands to acknowledge the loss of Eastham, who moved to Stoke from Arsenal in 1966, following England's World Cup triumph, for a fee of £35,000.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa forward and Ipswich midfielder on seven-man transfer watch list for Stoke and rivals
arts.sum: Stoke City and Championship rivals will have been keeping a keen eye on which loan players have been impressing in League One over the first half of the season to see who is ready to step up and make a difference in January. Stockport boss Dave Challinor told BBC Radio Manchester: "When you take a player on loan, especially from a Premier League club, the reality is you know what you're getting going into.

arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday boss breaks silence on Southampton link ahead of Stoke City clash
arts.sum: He said at his pre-match press conference: “I think the most important key point is that I’m here, that I’ll take the game tomorrow. Danny Rohl admits he was flattered to be named among the favourites to be new Southampton manager this week but - having now been overtaken in the odds by Ivan Juric - he has told Sheffield Wednesday supporters "the most important thing" is that he didn't leave in the end.
